thread.title: Solar Noob
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Solar Noob

author: Solar Noob
title: Solar Noob
text: We had no idea where to start with any background information about solar panels, or who to even ask for a Quote: . We stumbled upon Solar Quote: s through Google and glad we did. We now have enough background information to understand the options available and we had three very professional companies support our decision ... which is on hold due to finances ... We thoroughly recommend this as a start and finish point for anyone considering solar.
